title: Six Weeks

ALL_TEAM_MEMBERS: Voyager visually confirmed by telescope - now visible to public
New factions emerged: Voyager Vigil (religious), Earth First (resisters), violent splinter groups
Military commands in 4 nations considering destroying Voyager
Team is on target lists for militant groups
Marcus_Reid: Learned military option is being discussed
Understands mathematical trajectory shows failure at current rate
Believes they still have a chance despite odds
Rejects Kessler's suggestion to negotiate threshold or cheat
James_Kessler: Trying to prevent military strikes against Voyager
Suggests considering 'near-miss' - accept 80% as close enough
Still struggling with faith in humanity
Yuki_Tanaka: Acknowledges they're probably going to fail mathematically
